Birthday of Queen of UK marked 
    Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- James Edward Hoare, UK charge d'affaires to the DPRK, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Club for the diplomatic corps yesterday to celebrate the official birthday of the Queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
 Invited to the reception were Choe Su Hon, DPRK vice-minister of foreign affairs, officials concerned and foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here.    
 Speeches were made there.
